attributes.action: Save society and give parents more rights to keep their children safe.
attributes.additional_details: As a parent we should have the rights to go to any property and retrieve our children we should have the power to say I dont want my child there and it be respected and if we want our children in be 10 then we should have the power to make that happen.  Schools are bearing the brunt of unruly kids because the law says they can do what they want when they want at home and because they are allowed to run riot and have no boundaries its unbelievably hard to parent with your hands tied.
attributes.background: As a lone parent of 2 children I have striven to instill good manners and good behavior into them from an early age, I tried so hard to lead be example and set boundaries and the importance of punctuality. But the law prevents me from helping my child stay on the right path .

rejection.details: You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
